@chris, if you want to use your gamepad, use xpadder, worked ok for me, but using splitfish mode (Gamepad + mouse) is better.

I found the fix for in game sound fully working under the data folder rename any file containing USA to ENG ex EUROSOUND_USA_STR to EUROSOUND_ENG_STR make sure you change this to all files with USA to ENG.
